os.fullpath: Operating System :: Handheld/Embedded Operating Systems :: Android

name: Sense Open Kang Project (SOKP)
short_description:
AOKP, with HTC Sense 5.0 and other goodies...

As the name suggests, this ROM is essentially a modified version of AOKP with added goodies from other ROMS. I have added HTC Sense 5.0 elements and also have used APKS, mods and content from other ROMS to enhance the overall experience. My goal for this ROM is that it should be customizable, powerful, have a low battery life impact, feature packed, and look good overall.

This ROM uses APKs, mods and content from other ROMs

The ROMs I use APKs, mods and content from are listed below:

- CyanogenMod
- AOKP
- Paranoid Android
- Android Revolution HD
summary: AOKP, with HTC Sense 5.0 and other goodies...
